author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Hot off the heels of their ASUS collab, the ROG Xbox Ally X, Xbox president Sarah Bond has said that the next Xbox will be a 'premium' console/PC hybrid with a 'very high-end, curated experience.' This has lead many to speculate that the next Xbox following the Series X and S will be considerably more expensive, akin to high-end gaming PCs (a mid-range gaming PC already costs upwards of a thousand dollars). In related news, the price of Xbox development kits has gone up, but considerably more compared to retail consoles. Series X and S dev kits are now selling for $2,000, up 25% from $1,500. And finally, Xbox Game Pass Wave 2 for October has been revealed, and The Outer Worlds 2 leads the pack.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Microsoft's Next-Gen Xbox Will Be 'Very Premium, Very High-End' - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Update Announcement Trailer for Vampire Survivors: Ode to Castlevania, an upcoming expansion to the hit action autobattler bullet heaven game developed by Poncle. Players can soon access more content with 16 new characters, weapons unions, and more. The Update to Vampire Survivors: Ode to Castlevania launches alongside Version 1.14, coming soon to Vampire Survivors.
title: Vampire Survivors: Ode to Castlevania - Official Update Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Double Dragon Revive reviewed by Jarrett Green on PC, also available on Xbox, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch.

Double Dragon Revive feels less like a return to glory that its title might suggest, and more like a police sketch of someone trying to describe what the series they loved looked like from memory. There’s the important details you’d need to identify it by – simple combat with big super attacks, peacocking bad guys of all shapes and sizes, the subway, casino, and elevator stages required by law to be in games like this – but none of it feels distinct or special, and the parts in which it's passable get held back by wonky unresponsive controls and maddening difficulty spikes. Revival suggests reinvigoration, but this feels more like exhuming a shambling corpse.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Double Dragon Revive Review

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the International Trailer for Predator: Badlands, an upcoming addition to the sci-fi action thriller series distributed by 20th Century Studios. Predator: Badlands is in theaters on November 7.

Predator: Badlands, which stars Elle Fanning and Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi, is set in the future on a remote planet, where a young Predator (Schuster-Koloamatangi), outcast from his clan, finds an unlikely ally in Thia (Fanning) and embarks on a treacherous journey in search of the ultimate adversary. The film is directed by Dan Trachtenberg and produced by John Davis, Dan Trachtenberg, Marc Toberoff, Ben Rosenblatt, Brent O’Connor.

Predator: Badlands is in theaters on November 7.
title: Predator: Badlands - Official International Trailer (2025) Elle Fanning

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Accolades Trailer for Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, a remake of the classic third-person stealth action game developed by Konami. Players will embody the legendary Naked Snake on his journey through the Virtuous and Snake Eater Operations to put a stop to an all-out war as tensions rise against the United States and Soviet Union. Become Big Boss in Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Ninja Gaiden 4 stays true to the core tenets of Ninja Gaiden's combat: Extremely fast action, highly aggressive and intelligent AI, a huge focus on mobility and acrobatic offense, and hugely damaging chargeable ultimate techniques that launch into lengthy invincible combos. But it also changes a lot! So let's break down the 17 biggest changes in Ninja Gaiden 4.

#ign #gaming #ninjagaiden
title: The 17 Biggest Changes in Ninja Gaiden 4

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the latest Legacy of Valor cinematic trailer for the upcoming medieval RPG that blends realistic medieval environments with a deep system of estate management, large-scale battles, and personal stories. In Legacy of Valor, take on the role of a noble in a fallen kingdom, rebuilding power and influence while facing moral choices that shape both individual fates and the future of the realm. A Kickstarter campaign for Legacy of Valor is available now.
title: Legacy of Valor - Official Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out The Old Woman With The Knife trailer for the upcoming action movie starring Lee Hye-young, Kim Sung-cheol, and Kim Mu-yeol. 

Aging assassin Hornclaw has seen it all, but she never expected to mentor a reckless rookie like Bullfight. As their unlikely bond deepens, cracks form in the underworld they navigate together. When Hornclaw discovers someone wants her dead, she’s thrust into a deadly game of deception. With enemies closing in and trust in short supply, survival means staying sharp—both blade and mind.

The Old Woman With The Knife, directed by Kyu-dong Min, will be available on digital and physical November 25, 2025.
title: The Old Woman With The Knife - Official Trailer (2025) Lee Hye-young, Kim Sung-cheol

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'This Is an Xbox - Yup!' Trailer for Xbox, the gaming division at Microsoft. 

Players can access the fruits of Xbox from a multitude of avenues outside of the console, from a phone, laptop, Smart TV, ROG Xbox Ally, and ROG Xbox Ally X. Take a look at the latest trailer from Xbox, directed by Michel Gondry, and access Xbox wherever you can today.

#IGN #Xbox #ThisIsAnXbox
title: Xbox - Official 'This Is an Xbox - Yup!' Trailer (Ft. Michel Gondry)

author: IGN
description: The new HBO Max series brings director Andy Muschietti back to America's worst small town to explore the cycle of Pennywise carnage that precedes the events of It: Chapter One and It: Chapter Two, expanding on the Derry town history passages in Stephen King's novel. Though the premiere suffers some of the issues of Muschietti's film adaptations, Welcome to Derry's first hour largely succeeds in setting up a disturbing and exciting horror story for the small screen.
title: IT: Welcome to Derry: Season Premiere Review

author: IGN
description:
Celebrate the Spooky Season with the return of Doktor's Curse in Rainbow Six Siege X. Watch the latest Rainbow Six Siege X trailer to see what to expect with the Doktor's Curse limited-time event, with its Hide-and-Seek game mode. 

This year's Doktor's Curse limited-time event unfolds in a new map, a twisted version of Clubhouse: the Doktor's Lab. Step into the chaos as a relentless Hunter, armed with your Hammer or embrace the darkness as a cunning Monster and use stealth to survive throughout the night. Rainbow Six Siege X's Doktor's Curse event runs from today (October 22) to November 5, 2025.

#IGN #RainbowSixSiege #SiegeX
title: Rainbow Six Siege X: Doktor's Curse - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Season 1 Gameplay Trailer for Battlefield 6, the latest addition to the first-person action online shooter developed by DICE, Battlefield Studios, and EA. 

Players can soon gain access to Season 1 with new hardware, gadgets, maps, and monthly drops for Portal. Fight across the homestead facilities of Blackwell Fields or the quiet retreats of Eastwood with Season 1. Season 1 launches on October 28 for Battlefield 6 on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Battlefield6 #Battlefield6Season1
title: Battlefield 6 - Official Season 1 Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Release Date Announcement Trailer for Marvel Cosmic Invasion, an upcoming 2D action-adventure beat 'em up game developed by Tribute Games. Players will fight across the Marvel Universe to take on the Annihilation Wave across New York City to the Negative Zone. Get a new look at the last of the 15 playable characters with Invincible Iron Man and the Phoenix, punching their way to Marvel Cosmic Invasion, launching on December 1 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Marvel Cosmic Invasion - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted adds new vigor to a tower defense classic that still holds up 16 years later. 

It focuses on consolidating all the content from its many different versions into one package, while also introducing some decent new modes, a few quality-of-life improvements, and inconsistently updated visuals. Some of its attempts to remaster the original come with questionable design and stylistic choices, which can occasionally undermine its otherwise commendable updates. 

Still, Replanted provides a good way to get introduced to or re-acquainted with one of the quirkiest puzzle-strategy games of the 2000s.

#IGN #PlantsVsZombiesReplanted #Review
title: Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted Review

author: IGN
description:
The original Plants VS. Zombies is back, remastered in HD! 

The iconic tower-defence game, developed by PopCap Games and The Lost Pixels, this Replanted edition of PVZ is launching on October 23 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam). 

In this gameplay video, we fight through Level 2-10, Level 3-1, Level 3-2, Level 3-3, and Level 3-4!

#IGN #PlantsVsZombies #PopCapGames
title: Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted - Co-Op Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Dispatch, a superhero comedic narrative-driven game developed by AdHoc Studio. Players will assume the responsibility of managing a superhero team from any and all aspects. 

Make key narrative decisions to balance emerging threats around the city, interpersonal relations between the team, and becoming a true hero. Dispatch is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Dispatch #SuperHero
title: Dispatch - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
From Halo to Resident Evil, Aaron Paul talks about his favourite games and what it was like recording voice lines for AdHoc Studio's Dispatch, a workplace comedy single-player game with a superhero twist.

#IGN #AaronPaul #Interview
title: "I’ve Wanted to be in a Game for a Long Time” - Aaron Paul on Dispatch and His Favourite Games

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Pikmin 4 trailer for the action strategy game to see what's coming with a new update, including the ability to take photos on your adventure with the new Field Camera, experience an easier or harder journey with two new Creature Activity Levels, and Decor Pikmin. 

Decor Pikmin can also join you in the smart device app, Pikmin Bloom. Pikmin 4's new update will be available in November 2025, and an updated free demo of the main game will be available on the same day.

#IGN #Pikmin4 #Switch2
title: Pikmin 4 - Official Update Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The apocalypse comes to Goat Simulator 3 with this latest DLC! 
Explore the ruined world with a brand new map, filled to bursting with familiar locales, new quests, goat gear and plenty of post-apocalyptic parodies! 
Baadlands Furry Road releases for Goat Simulator 3 on November 19th! 
Goat Simulator 3 is out now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S and PC (Epic Games Store and Steam)
title: Goat Simulator 3 - Official Baadlands Furry Road DLC Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Breach Update Trailer for No Man's Sky, the hit sci-fi action-adventure online game developed by Hello Games. Players can explore the galaxy with new space wrecks to comb over and salvage materials for future endeavors. New purple-star solar systems are also available, allowing travelers to brave deeper oceans, incredible terrains, and volatile gas giants alongside a spooky story to discover fitting for the season. The Breach Update for No Man's Sky is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.
title: No Man's Sky: Breach - Official Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The 2001 GameCube classic is back! 

Luigi's Mansion is the latest GameCube title to be added to the Nintendo Classics catalogue, playable via the Nintendo Switch Online Service. Play as Luigi as you explore a mansion packed with ghosts as you explore for the missing Mario. Defend yourself from these spooky spirits with the Polturgust 3000 and your trust GameBoy! 

Luigi's Mansion will be available to download via Nintendo Classics Catalogue October 30th!

#IGN #LuigisMansion #NintendoSwitchOnline
title: Nintendo Classics: Luigi's Mansion - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Pokemon Legends: Z-A reviewed by Rebekah Valentine on Nintendo Switch 2, also available on Nintendo Switch 1.

Pokemon Legends: Z-A finally feels like Game Freak hitting its stride in Pokemon’s 3D era. Lumiose City may not be visually thrilling, but exciting Pokemon encounters, well-written characters, and amusing side quests still make it fun to explore while also serving as the ideal vehicle for a more intimate and emotionally mature Pokemon story. Z-A’s total battle system overhaul from turn-based to action also works surprisingly well, managing to be intuitive for series veterans and engaging to play casually while introducing all sorts of intriguing possibilities for deeper, competitive play. And while Z-A could use a little performance help on the Switch 1, it’s a marked improvement from its predecessors and significantly better if you’re playing on Switch 2. After several years of putting the controller down with a deep sigh at the end of a Pokemon review, it sure is refreshing
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A Review
